page.title: 10New industry in Pontycymer
page.content: Flextank L.T.D. is a factory situated in Pontycymer, which produces a wide range of plastic goods. It was set up in 1968 and then employed 28 people, today it employs about 135 peple. 75% of the work force come from the Garw. Only 15%of employees are skilled , 20% are said to be semi-skilled, whilst 65% are unskilled. Flextank employs many school leavers chiefly through Youth Opportunity schemes. Flextank has always supported the works experience program initialed by the local comprehensive school, the school for secondary aged pupils in the valley is situated six miles south where more suitable building land is available.
